column4: when I on my laptop,instead of the grub list,I see the grub> command prompt.. Any ideas to login into windows
I guess your grub stage 1 can't find stage 2. You need to reinstall grub and make stage 1 in MBR point to correct stage 2
If you have a live cd that has grub (like arch has) you could select boot existing OS, hit TAB and change to where you know your windows boot is at
